Text: Vanguard Group Inc. grew its stake in shares of Travelers Companies by 1.2% in the second quarter. Vanguard Group Inc. now owns 22,438,220 shares of the insurance provider's stock worth $3,354,963,000 after acquiring an additional 271,094 shares during the last quarter.
